body.name: JC Jorden Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set, Hands Free Flat Floor Mop and Bucket, 3 Washable Microfiber Pads Included, Wet and Dry Use, Home Floor Cleaning System for All Floor Types and Windows
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 1 min
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 16 mins
features: HANDS-FREE CLEANING TOOL—The bucket with 2 separate chambers for washing and drying. Scratch dirt, hair and dust away in WASH chamber, squeeze out of water in DRY chamber, no water left after moping.

REMOVE CORNER DIRT—360° Rotation flat mop head can reach to any corner and narrow space. Adjustable Stainless Steel Handle can be extended from 26.5" to 50.0", even under the bed and under the sofa can be reached easily. Perfect for floor and window cleaning in home and office.

EASY TO USE—The bucket has a handle, which can facilitate you to move the bucket and clean different locations and rooms. Our flat mop head can automatically rebound within 30 degrees without touching. It can effectively prevent dirt from getting on your hands.

3 WASHABLE MICROFIBER MOP PADS—The microfiber mop pads with excellent water absorption that easily do any wet and dry cleaning. You can put the mop pad in the washing machine to clean it, so you can really free your hands.

QUALITY SERVICE—After use you can insert the mop into the mop bucket and place it in any corner of your home without taking up space. If you encounter any problem while using the product, please feel free to contact our support team. We would sincerely serve you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to store. It’s durable. It gets the job done. I’m happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps hands and floor clean
reviews.reviewText: This Hands-Free Mop and Bucket set is a super cool! The two-chamber design makes cleaning a breeze - wash away dirt in one, squeeze out water in the other, leaving floors dry and spotless. The 360° rotation mop head effortlessly tackles corners, reaching under furniture effortlessly. The adjustable handle is a bonus, extending to 50 inches for versatile cleaning. Convenient drain holes and a sturdy handle add to the user-friendly design. The three washable microfiber pads are a dream, offering exceptional water absorption and easy machine cleaning. Finally, a cleaning tool that's efficient, user-friendly, and leaves floors gleaming! Highly recommended for hassle-free home maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice mop. It is easy to put together. It comes with a bucket, a mop, and three pads. I like this design of mop over the rag type. It gets the floor clean without a huge mess. I like that I can clean walls and mouldings with this. It's lightweight and easy to clean the walls. The bucket is a good size so you can do a lot of cleaning but it's not too heavy to carry from room to room and to fill and change the water. It's a nifty cleaning tool to make cleaning easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried out a variety of different types of mops,. I have noticed, as time goes on the “common” house hold mop just keeps getting reinvented over and over again. Gone are the days of a long wooden stick with a large ball of yarn.. I like this mop because it is very simple, light weight and the shape of the mop pad is great because I am able to get underneath my fridge, sofa, Oven. I can effortlessly maneuver underneath my kitchen and coffee table while I weave in/out and through the legs without missing any spots! I also like that the dirty water is not mixed with the clean water by using an innovative way to rinse the mop pad and squeeze the excess water out. The mop itself even breaks down and everything fits perfectly right into the bucket. It also came with two extra mop pads!! I definitely recommend this mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mop and bucket works very well for me. Easy to handle no mess. Quick floor, cleanup. No wringing out any mop anymore. This product works easily it squeeze off the mop pad to ensure you don’t have too much water for much mess. You got three mop pads, and hold 2 gallons of water. It cleans my floor very well. I love it.!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our professional cleaner loves it!
reviews.reviewText: Our professional cleaner was so happy we ordered this for our vinyl plank floors! And talk about clean after using it! She was impressed, as are we, with the sturdiness and ease of use. Well done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thing
reviews.reviewText: After working a 12 hour day I couldn’t wait to get home and use this. As soon as I walked in the door I went to work. I love this mop. I had such a blast cleaning the floors through my whole house. It’s very simple to use. Very easy clean up and it doesn’t leave your floors wet for very long. It’s a great buy if you ask me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t know why we waited so long to buy something like this. Sturdy, easy to use, really works great and saves a lot of time.
